name: Bunny Brown vs. The Book Report
name_original: Bunny Brown vs. The Book Report
description:
In this second episode, Bunny finds her choice of literature criticized, intercepts a phone call intended for her parents, and has a (very) brief existential crisis.  Enjoy! Remember, everything is better with ice cream!

Rated "T" for language and disrespectful behavior ;)

Music credits: 

"Life of Riley" by Kevin MacLeod ) Source: http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/index.html?isrc=USUAN1400054, 

Lullabye (Sting) by Twin Musicom  Artist: http://www.twinmusicom.org/
